title: Lasagna Bolognese
author: Mario Rossi
description: A classic from Emilia-Romagna with layers of fresh pasta, meat ragù, and béchamel sauce.

title: Mixed Sushi
author: Yuki Tanaka
description: An assortment of fresh sushi and sashimi with seasoned rice and raw fish.

title: Pad Thai
author: Somsak Chai
description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.

title: Almond Chicken
author: Li Wei
description: Tender chicken bites stir-fried with toasted almonds, soy sauce, and ginger.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Luca Bianchi
description: Traditional Roman pasta with guanciale, eggs, pecorino cheese, and black pepper.
